channel.title: Projects on Jerry Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jerry Lin

item.title: Al Dente Restaurant Finder
item.description: Inspired by the ideal consistency of pasta — “to the tooth” — this mighty restaurant finder makes it easier than ever to find the restaurant that’s perfect for you. Simply type in a search term, and you’ll find results curated by Yelp’s search engine. If you’re paralyzed by indecision, use the convenient Quick Recommendations panel for ideas. With automated location access, you can skip the hassle of typing in your location.

item.title: DMV Buster
item.description: I’m a college student trying to grab an appointment for a behind-the-wheel test. Unfortunately, appointments are literally booked out three months in advance. There are occasional openings when someone cancels, but these are hard to find and usually snatched up instantly. I went looking for bots online to automate this appointment search for me, but none of them work ever since the DMV deployed a ReCaptcha on the appointment finder page.
